data.Name: Brother Beyond
data.Bio: Brother Beyond were a British boy band / pop group, that saw some mainstream success in the late 1980s. Band members Nathan Moore - born Nathan Marcellus Moore, 10 January 1965, in Stamford Hill, London - Vocalist David White - born 6 June 1965, in Highbury, North London - Guitarist / Vocalist Carl Fysh - born 25 January 1963 - Keyboardist Steve Alexander - born 20 November 1962, in Ystradgynlais, Powys, Mid Wales - Drummer Former members Eg White - Drummer Read more on Last.fm
